title: When is pixel 4a is launching in India
content: For god's sake kindly reveal when Pixel 4a will be launched. People tend to lose interest and move towards OnePlus nord. It feels forever. Atleast launch date, availability and cost should be updated in the website. You are literally making people to lose interest on Google products. My phone is broken. Don't know how long to wait for Pixel 4a's launch. Moreover YouTube feed is full of pixel 4a videos. All we ask is wheather price is below 30k or above 30k.. Launch date... Availability.. that's all.. COMING SOON should be for few days.. not months.. stop measuring the unit of time in light years..
